metadata.synopsis: The goblins are watching Abdirak flaggelating himself in service of Loviatar and are disappointed with his methods of inflicting pain.

0.speaker: Torturer Spike
0.text: What's he doin'? It's just the same thing over an' over.
0.context: NodeContext: mumbled to the goblin standing next to him.

1.speaker: Torturer Spike
1.text: C'mon! You can do better than that!
1.context: NodeContext: shouted at the priest standing at the other side of the (small) room. He's disappointed that the priest is not hurting himself in more creative ways.

2.speaker: Torturer Spike
2.text: You got candles all 'round ya! Use 'em!
2.context: NodeContext: shouted at the priest standing at the other side of the (small) room. He's disappointed that the priest is not hurting himself in more creative ways.

3.speaker: Lookout Grush
3.text: Oh yes! Everyone howls when they're on fire!
3.context: NodeContext: excited at the prospect of seeing someone set himself on fire.

4.speaker: Torturer Spike
4.text: Didn't he call himself a master? Would've thought he'd be more creative.
4.context: NodeContext: mumbled to the goblin standing next to him. He's disappointed that the priest is not hurting himself in more creative ways.
